title: Shou Chew: TikTok's CEO on AI, data, and the future | TED2023
topics: Platform DNA vs. Competitors & Filter Bubbles
Screen Time, Addiction Risk & Digital Wellness
U.S. vs. China Youth Experience â€” Clarification
Harmful Trends, Sexualized Content & Moderation at Scale
Data Security, ByteDance Links & Project Texas
summary_brief: At TED2023, TikTok CEO Shou Chew discussed the platform's interest-based algorithm, content moderation policies, and addressed U.S. national security concerns over data and China by detailing 'Project Texas'.

actions.description_plain: Further implement and transparently communicate TikTok's data security and localization initiative (Project Texas) to regulators and users.
Host follow-up public conversations on digital wellness, screen time, and youth protections across social media platforms.
